About Me

About me and what I do

Your Goal is in safe hands

I can assist you wether your goal is to get your business books cleaned or a non-native English speaker that would like to improve your level. With a degree in accounting and a TESOL certification, I can help you reach either one.

Google Tech Support

Google's first and highly detailed certificate on basic and advanced computer technical support

Google Python Automation

A Google created certification to show how to use Python for many tasks including automation for computer/network troubleshooting.

Quickbooks Pro Advisor

A certification that shows that I am fully trained in all aspects of QuickBooks Online and of accounting principles.

TESOL (in Progress)

An internationlly recognized certification showing that the holder has been fully trained in preparing lessons and teaching English to non-native speakers using a full immersion program.

Technical skills
